message2: This app exist to provide players with correct information about the available cards you can pick in the arena draft.
message3: In the Arena page is a table with all the cards you can pick with varius filters to apply
message4: The all cards page provides a table with all Hearthstone cards and lots of filter to help you find the card you are looking for.
message5: The cards per hero page gives you a full image list of the cards
message6: Finally there is a 12 win arena page, where i post the decks that made it. Some of them containing 3 or more copies of the same card so i am unable to provide you with a deck code.
message7: You will find some weird stuff in the card data like neutral spells. Sorry folks, This is what Blizzards' Database says
message8: This is a non profit web app. All Hearthstone names cards images etc belong to Blizzard Entertainment.
message9: Made with Vue2 js, Bootstrap 4, firebase (hosting) and lots of love....
message10: Type a deck code to get the cards
Name: Name
